title: Coronavirus | Resident doctor of Lucknow’s KGMU tests positive
description: King George Medical University announced suspension of all undergraduate academic classes and examinations till April 2 as a preventive measure to stem the spread of COVID-19.
content: A year old junior resident doctor of the King George Medical University KGMU in Lucknow has tested positive for coronavirus COVID after coming in contact with two patients undergoing treatment for the disease on its premises a hospital spokesperson chars
